welcome.hero.title: Packaging Management
welcome.hero.subtitle: Modern system for complete management of offers, articles, orders and production. Optimise your operational processes with powerful, easy-to-use tools.
welcome.features.section_subtitle: Powerful tools designed to optimise your workflow
welcome.feature_0_desc: Manage offers, activities, sectors and order types efficiently.
welcome.feature_1_desc: Full control of articles, categories and production operations.
welcome.feature_2_desc: Real-time monitoring of order status and progress.
welcome.feature_3_desc: Complete records with divisions and delivery addresses.
welcome.feature_4_desc: Statistics, performance metrics, comparative analysis and 5 interactive charts.
welcome.feature_5_desc: Web and mobile interface for production operators in real time.
welcome.benefits.section_subtitle: Benefits that improve your productivity and operational efficiency
welcome.benefit_0_desc: Improve operational efficiency with real-time monitoring.
welcome.benefit_1_desc: Complete management of the lifecycle of offers and orders.
welcome.benefit_2_desc: Highly configurable system adapted to your needs.
welcome.cta_section.title: Ready to get started?
welcome.cta_section.desc: Join our system and optimise your production management
welcome.meta_description: Modern system for complete management of offers, articles, orders and production. Optimise your operational processes with powerful, easy-to-use tools.

auth.two_factor.recovery_codes_descripti: Recovery codes allow you to regain access if you lose your 2FA device. Store them in a secure password manager.
auth.two_factor.recovery_codes_warning: Each recovery code can be used only once to access your account and will be removed after use. If you need more, click «Regenerate codes» above.

settings.two_factor.enabled_description: When two-factor authentication is enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random code during login. You may retrieve this code from your phone's TOTP-compatible application.
settings.two_factor.disabled_description: When you enable two-factor authentication, you will be prompted for a secure code during login. This code may be obtained from a TOTP-compatible application on your phone.

orders.manage_status.title: Manage Order Status
orders.manage_status.sections.semaforo_d: Indicate if labels, packaging and product are ready before launching the order.
orders.manage_status.toasts.semaforo_err: An error occurred while saving the traffic light.
orders.manage_status.toasts.semaforo_con: Connection error while saving the traffic light. Please try again.
orders.manage_status.toasts.status_error: An error occurred while updating the order status.
orders.manage_status.toasts.status_conne: Connection error while updating status. Please try again.
orders.manage_status.errors.select_statu: Select a new status to proceed.
orders.manage_status.errors.motivazione_: Reason is required to suspend the order.
orders.manage_status.dialogs.back_desc: Do you want to return to the order details page? Saved status changes will remain applied.
orders.manage_status.dialogs.allestiment: Do you want to change the order status to Preparation?
orders.manage_status.dialogs.sospendi_de: The order will be moved to Suspended status. Specify a reason to remember why it was paused.
orders.manage_status.dialogs.evaso_desc: Do you want to change the order status to Shipped?
orders.manage_status.dialogs.riprendi_de: Do you want to resume the order and return it to In progress?
orders.manage_status.dialogs.forza_desc: Are you sure you want to force the order status to In progress?
orders.manage_status.placeholders.suspen: Briefly indicate the reason for suspension...
orders.manage_status.help.semaforo_ready: Traffic light: all ready, you can launch the order.
orders.manage_status.help.semaforo_amber: Traffic light: ready to launch, but with controls still to complete.
orders.manage_status.help.semaforo_red: Traffic light: NOT ready to launch. Set at least yellow for all items.
orders.manage_status.help.semaforo_note: Saving the traffic light does not change the order status: the transition to "Launched" happens from the "Change Order Status" panel.
orders.manage_status.help.all_green_prom: All traffic lights are green. Do you want to change the order status to "Launched"?
orders.manage_status.help.status_0: The order is planned. When you are ready to prepare materials and labels, move it to Preparation.
orders.manage_status.help.status_1: When the traffic light is at least yellow for all items you can move the order to "Launched". If all are green we recommend doing it immediately.
orders.manage_status.help.status_2: The order is in Launched status. It will automatically move to In progress when the first quantity is recorded from the portal. If you want to start production immediately without waiting, use the button below.
orders.manage_status.help.status_3: The order is In progress (in production). You can temporarily suspend it by indicating the reason, or mark it as Shipped when work is complete.
orders.manage_status.help.status_4: The order is suspended. When the issue is resolved you can resume it by returning to In progress.
orders.manage_status.help.status_5: The order is shipped. When administrative tasks are complete, move it to Paid.
orders.manage_status.help.status_6_desc: No further status changes are possible. The order is permanently closed.
orders.manage_status.help.select_state: Select the new status for this order.
orders.manage_status.help.allestimento_n: This step prepares the order for production (materials and labels). It is not meant to be reverted frequently.
orders.manage_status.help.forza_note: Moves the order to In progress without waiting for the first quantity from the portal. Useful if production has already started or for manual corrections.
orders.manage_status.help.sospendi_evaso: Suspend: pauses the order (reason required). Move to Shipped: marks work as complete; you can then close it as Paid.
orders.manage_status.help.riprendi_note: Returns the order from the Suspended branch to active production (In progress status). Use this action when the suspension reason has been resolved.
orders.manage_status.help.evaso_saldato_: From Shipped you can only complete the order by moving it to Paid, after closing the administrative part.
orders.manage_status.help.motivazione_re: Reason is required to suspend an order.
